parameters.name: Body1InterferedFaceArray
parameters.description: Array of faces that interfered from the first body with the second body

parameters.name: Body2InterferedFaceArray
parameters.description: Array of faces that interfered from the second body with the first body

parameters.name: IntersectedBodyArray
parameters.description: Bodies generated from the intersection of the input bodies

title: IModeler.ICheckInterference2
signature:
void ICheckInterference2( 
   out Face2
Body1InterferedFaceArray
,
   out Face2
Body2InterferedFaceArray
,
   out Body2
IntersectedBodyArray
)

parameters.name: Body1InterferedFaceArray
parameters.description: Array of faces that interfered from the first body with the second body

parameters.name: Body2InterferedFaceArray
parameters.description: Array of faces that interfered from the second body with the first body

parameters.name: IntersectedBodyArray
parameters.description: Bodies generated from the intersection of the input bodies

remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IModeler::ICheckInterferenceCount2
to allocate memory for the arrays returned from this method.
